description: Installation of vertical ductwork to rear elevation (following removal of existing vertical ductwork)
decision_conditions: 1.	The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | 2.	The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing (02)02 proposed roof plan, (02)03 existing and proposed rear elevations  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | 3. The rating noise level emitted from any external plant and machinery for the vertical ductwork hereby approved, as assessed under BS4142: 1997, shall be lower than the existing background noise level by at least 5 dBA as measured at 3.5 m from the nearest sensitive facade and 1m from upper floor noise sensitive facades, during the relevant periods of operation. Reason: In interest of neighbouring residential/ commercial amenity in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management  Plan 2013, policies 1.1(g), (h) and 2.1(c) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Adopted Core strategy 2012) and policies 7.1, 7.6 of the London Plan (2015). | 4. Details shall be submitted for approval of the Local Planning Authority before the development is commenced, for the installation, operation, and maintenance of the best practicable odour abatement equipment including an extract system and the efflux velocity of the effluent at the point of discharge.  The system, as approved, shall be completed before occupation and thereafter permanently retained and maintained. Reason:  In interest of neighbouring residential/ commercial amenity in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policies 1.1(g), (h) and 2.1(c) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Adopted Core strategy 2012) and policies 7.1, 7.6 of the London Plan (2015) and with the guidance from DEFRA named "Guidance on the Control of Odour and Noise from Commercial Kitchen Exhaust Systems, 2005". | 5.Notwithstanding the information submitted with this application, the discharge of the extraction system hereby approved shall be 1m above the flat roof of the building Reason: In interest of neighbouring residential/ commercial amenity in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management  Plan 2013, policies 1.1(g), (h) and 2.1(c) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Adopted Core strategy 2012) and policies 7.1, 7.6 of the London Plan (2015).
